constants._reserved: Health maps ARE constants for the health scoring system. All operations, multipliers, and impacts defined in BODY are static definitions that code reads to calculate health scores.

variables._reserved: Health maps don't hold mutable runtime state. The map defines operations and impacts - actual health scores are calculated and stored elsewhere.

type_behaviors._reserved: Health maps have no executable behaviors. The map is declarative data defining WHAT operations exist and their impacts - HOW health is calculated lives in the health scoring code.

_omission_guide.rule: Unlike METADATA (where sections can be omitted), ALL six SETUP sections must be present for structural alignment.
